DOC.brief_summary: To compare effectiveness acupuncture transcutaneous electrical nervous stimulation ( TENS ) reduce patient 's discomfort colonoscopy
DOC.brief_title: Electroacupuncture Trancutaneous Electrical Nervous Stimulation ( TENS ) Colonoscopy Analgesia
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluation patient 's pain discomfort colonoscopy , use two non invasive analgesic method .
DOC.criteria: patient schedule colonoscopy deep sedation plan include study age > 80 less 18 year old , severe cardiac pulmonary disease , anticoagulant , benzodiazepine , antidepressant , opiates therapy , severe cognitive impairment , uncontrolled hypertension .
